long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bitfi is an extension for accessing sending, receiving XDC via Bitfi wallet in your browser!

The extension injects the Bitfi API into every website's javascript context, so that dapps or other websites can communicate with Bitfi wallet. You can. think about the extension as a secure mediator between your Bitfi hardware wallet and an arbitrary website 

Because it adds functionality to the normal browser context, Bitfi chrome extension requires the permission to read and write to any webpage. 

Enables access to:
Sending/receiving XDC crypto via Bitfi wallet
